thread.title_full: Kayla Itsines Bikini Body Guide Workout Discount Site reviewed by 55dopey

author: 55dopey
title: 55dopey
text: The 80% coupon was wonderful and it was such a good checkout process. I rated it 4 out of 5 because they request that you do this review to get something for free but I am generally happy so far. I bought the eBooks because the reviews on everything else seemed terrible. I also only gave them 4 out of 5 because I want to see how well this system works and if its actually applicable for "normal" people.
